import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckOutSteps from '../components/CheckOutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) // Calculate Prices cart.itemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0) cart.shippingPrice = cart.itemsPrice > 100 ? 0 : 100 cart.taxPrice = Number((0.15 * cart.itemsPrice).toFixed(2)) const addDecimals = (num) => { return (Math.round(num * 100 ) / 100).toFixed(2) } const placeOrderHandler = () => { console.log('order') } return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postCode}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country},

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Your cart is empty : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x £{item.price} = £{item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items £{cart.itemsPrice} Shipping £{cart.shippingPrice} Tax £{cart.taxPrice} Total £{cart.totalPrice} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
